title: How to get a job at riot, Plz reply riot
body:
Hey
I was wondering if it was possible to get a job at riot games Sydney (for the Esports section) in Perth, I've been really wanting too work at this company since I have started playing the game. I extremely passionate about Esports and when I myself play Ranked Solo Queue I take it extremely seriously. I was just wondering if someone could help me out here? 
Thank You Kind Regards FearinqIV
